name: Spaceships game
description:
This is a simple console game with spaceships. This game is not finished and it was abandoned. I upload it just to save it ;)

How to install it:

1) Download .zip file

2) Unzip it

3) Click setup file, and install it.

4) You can open a shortcut of the game named "Spaceship Game.exe" in your desktop window, or search it in your apps ;)

Details of multiplayer online

Multiplayer online wasn't implemented. If you select that option, the game will be loading infinitely. Most likely is that it won't be implemented in a future either.

Source code

If you want to view the source code of this game, you can do it clicking this link:

https://github.com/julienf04/julienfEngine
